summary.span: 實作 類別的自訂保存格式。

span.span: Implements a custom persistence format for the class.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 伺服器控制項可以使用自己的控制項產生器，以實作自訂持續性格式。ASP.NET server controls can implement customized persistence formats by using their own control builder. 這是藉由建立控制項產生器類別，並將控制項產生器屬性加入至類別。This is done by creating a control builder class and adding a control builder attribute to the class. 剖析和編譯的頁面時，會使用控制項產生器物件。Control builder objects are used when the page is parsed and compiled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作自訂持續性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac8e85a9-422e-49b8-98c0-5ade5853ea7c)。For more information, see [Implementing Custom Persistence](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac8e85a9-422e-49b8-98c0-5ade5853ea7c).

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

param.name: parser

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法在剖析期間由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫，並不是直接在您的程式碼中呼叫。This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in your code.
